Package population

Class Chromosome

java.lang.Object
population.Chromosome
public class Chromosome extends Object
The Chromosome used in the Genetic Algorithm in this project represents a String created with a collection of genes(characters) taken from ascii (0-126). The size of this String depends on the size of the TARGET String defined in the Utilities class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    chromosome
    The data member chromosome represents the actual String that represents the Chromosome instance.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Chromosome(String chromosome)
    Parameterized Constructor of Chromosome class taking String as an argument which is assigned to the chromosome data member of the class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calculateFitness()
    The calculateFitness() method counts the number of equalities between the data member chromosome string and the TARGET string defined in the Utilities class and returns the count as an integer.
    Chromosome
    crossover(Chromosome secondParent)
    The crossover() method of the Chromosome class takes another Chromosome as an argument and returns the child Chromosome which is created when crossover occurs between the Chromosome that calls the method and the Chromosome that is passed as argument.
    int
    getFitness()
    The getFitness() method returns the value of the calculateFitness() method of the Chromosome which calls the getFitness() method.
    void
    mutate()
    The mutate() method defined in the Mutation interface is a member function of the Chromosome class.
    void
    setCrossover(Crossover crossover)
    The setCrossover() method takes a Crossover object as an argument and assigns it to the crossover data member of the Chromosome class.
    void
    setMutation(Mutation mutation)
    The setMutation() method takes a Mutation object as an argument and assigns it to the mutation data member of the Chromosome class.
    String
    toString()
    The toString() method of the Chromosome class returns the chromosome date member concatenated with the Fitness value of the chromosome.

      The getFitness() method returns the value of the calculateFitness() method of the Chromosome which calls the getFitness() method.

    • crossover

      public Chromosome crossover(Chromosome secondParent)
      The crossover() method of the Chromosome class takes another Chromosome as an argument and returns the child Chromosome which is created when crossover occurs between the Chromosome that calls the method and the Chromosome that is passed as argument.
      Parameters:
      secondParent -
      Returns:
      Chromosome (Child Chromosome)

    • calculateFitness

      public int calculateFitness()
      The calculateFitness() method counts the number of equalities between the data member chromosome string and the TARGET string defined in the Utilities class and returns the count as an integer. It returns the minimum value 0 if there is no match between the strings and a maximum value of sizeOf(TARGET) if both of the strings match exactly.
      Returns:
      fitness (integer)
